hebrewSingleEvent.text: 专 砖注 10:00 砖  驻砖 拽驻 转

 砖 23/12

englishEvent.text: Meeting tomorrow at 2pm in the office. Please bring your laptops.
englishEvent.description: Single English event with relative date

englishMultipleEvents.text:
Team events this week:
1. Monday 9am - Standup in Room A
2. Wednesday 3pm - Sprint review in Conference Room
3. Friday 5pm - Happy hour at the rooftop bar
englishMultipleEvents.description: Multiple English events with specific days and times

falsePositivePast.text: I went to the movies yesterday. It was great!
falsePositivePast.description: Past event reference - should not be detected as future event

falsePositiveCasual.text: Hey, how are you? Want to grab coffee sometime?
falsePositiveCasual.description: Casual conversation without concrete event details

falsePositiveQuestion.description: Question about an event, not event creation

complexDateTime.text: Dentist appointment next Tuesday at 15:30 at Dr. Smith's clinic on Main Street
complexDateTime.description: Event with relative date (next Tuesday) and 24-hour time format

hebrewRelativeDate.text: 专转 砖注 8 拽专 砖
hebrewRelativeDate.description: Hebrew with relative date (day after tomorrow)

eventWithoutTime.text: Company picnic on Saturday at Central Park
eventWithoutTime.description: Event with date but no specific time (should default to 08:00)

allDayEvent.text: Holiday vacation from December 25th to December 31st

hebrewWithEmojis.text: 住转  转 专 砖注 20:00 转 砖

recurringEvent.text: Weekly team meeting every Monday at 10am in Conference Room B
recurringEvent.description: Recurring event (note: currently only creates first occurrence)

ambiguousDate.text: Let's meet on the 15th at noon
ambiguousDate.description: Date without explicit month (should infer from context)

eventWithDuration.text: Yoga class tomorrow from 6pm to 7:30pm at Fitness Center

hebrewDateFormats.description: Hebrew event with numeric date format

multipleLocations.text: Tour starting at 10am from City Hall, then to Museum at 12pm, ending at Restaurant at 2pm
multipleLocations.description: Multiple events at different locations forming a tour
